scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node bin/production
scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && cd dist && mkdir test && babel ../test -s -d test
scripts.build-routes: npm run clean-routes && cd dist && mkdir routes && babel ../routes -s -d routes
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel server.js model/dbConfig.js controllers/QuestionManager.js controllers/QuestionRoutes.js controllers/UserManager.js controllers/UsersRoute.js controllers/Votes.js net/DatabaseManager.js middleware/validateToken.js middleware/inputValidation.js middleware/validateAuthor.js -s -d dist && npm run build-routes && npm run build-test
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migration && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run clean-test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run build-test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --timeout 10000 "dist/test/routes/routeTest.js" --exit
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build-routes && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migration && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node bin/production
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build-routes && node bin/production
